com.compendium.ui.popups
Class UIViewUnreadPopupMenu

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPopupMenu
                  com.compendium.ui.popups.UIViewUnreadPopupMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class UIViewUnreadPopupMenu
extends javax.swing.JPopupMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class draws and handles events for the right-cick menu for nodes in a unread view

See Also:
